# Luc

Started `2023-02-23`.

Hubs can be purchased via KoFi Shop at [shop.luc.cat](https://shop.luc.cat) or contact Luc via discord.  
Spacers are included with every purchase. Will print extra upon request.  
Shipping from Germany to EU + UK.
